alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 11:27AM EST until March 15 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton. .Recent heavy rainfall in the Patoka River basin has caused the river to rise. At Princeton, the river is forecast to crest in minor flooding late this week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until Tuesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 18.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CST Tuesday was 18.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to a crest of 19.7 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday March 15. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
